summary: A look at the life and music of Nigerian singer Fela Kuti.
cast: Fela Kuti|Yeni Kuti|Femi Kuti|Seun Kuti|Bill T. Jones|Okwechime Abdul|Tony Allen|Kewe Anikulapo-Kuti|Antibalas|Hettie Barnhill|J.K. Braimah|John Darnton|Lemi Ghariokwu|Ogugua Iwelu|Sandra Izsadore|Francis Kertekian|Jim Lewis|Paul McCartney|Carlos Moore|Sahr Ngaujah|Martin Perna|Questlove|Duain Richmond|Saycon Sengbloh|Dele Sosimi|Rikki Stein|Michael Veal
title: Finding Fela!
